price: 28. Mise ma waxaanu la mid yeeli kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha fala sida kuwa ku fala fasahaad arlada? mise ma waxaanu la mid yeeli kuwa iska jira xumaha sida faajiriinta?
arabic: أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلۡفُجَّارِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am najʿalu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kal-muf'sidīna fī al-arḍi am najʿalu al-mutaqīna kal-fujāri
